When the Batsbi caritive suffix is used to derive adverbials, Desheriev (1953) transcribes it as -c’i (without nasalization, which historically is a marker of attributivization), but, according to Jesse Wichers Schreur (p.c.), synchronically -c’in never occurs without nasalization
